what.legend: What do you want to do?

request.label: Request a Notice of Letting to a Disqualified Person if you think someone may be disqualified from renting
request.toggle-content: If you have reasonable cause to believe that a person is disqualified from renting due to their immigration status you can request a Notice of Letting to a Disqualified Person from the Home Office to confirm this. You can then use this to help you end the tenancy.

check.label: Check if a person living in your property is still disqualified from renting
check.toggle-content: The Home Office will write to you if someone who is named on a Notice of Letting to a Disqualified Person is no longer disqualified from renting. However if some time has passed since you received a Notice of Letting to a Disqualified Person you may wish to be completely sure that it is still valid before you use it to end a tenancy.

report.label: Report that a disqualified person has left your property
report.toggle-content: Tell the Home Office that a person has left your property following a Notice of Letting to a Disqualified Person. This means that the Home Office can update their records.

nldp-date.label: What was the date of issue for the Notice of Letting to a Disqualified Person?
nldp-date.summary: Date of issue of Notice of Letting to a Disqualified Person

property-address-select.label: Select the address as shown on the Notice of Letting to a Disqualified Person.

name.label: Full name as it's written on the Notice of Letting to a Disqualified Person

add-another.legend: Has anyone else listed on the same Notice of Letting to a Disqualified Person left the property?

agent.label: Agent acting on behalf of a landlord

landlord-company.label: Your company name
landlord-company.hint: (if you have one, if you don't leave blank)

who.landlord: Select your address from the list

label.default: Select the address from the list

landlord-address-use-previous-address.label: Use the address of the rental property I provided earlier

agent-address-select.label: Select the address from the list.

who.agent: I confirm I am an agent acting on behalf of the landlord

label.default: I confirm I am the landlord

declaration.label: I confirm that the information I've provided is correct to the best of my knowledge
